TIP1: You have to rotate the circles in the second row by clicking/tapping on them and match the upper quadrant of the circle with the color displayed above
TIP2: Everytime you click/tap a circle, the adjacent circles rotate as well.
TIP3: There is a spin counter, which shows the number of spins you are using to solve the game.
TIP4: All you have to do to win is, get all the upper quadrants of the circles match with the respective color displayed above in minimum spins possible
ABOUT: ColorShuffle is a minimalistic game which demonstrates internationalization features of INTEGRTR Translation Hub. There is a blog written around how INTEGRTR Translation Hub can be used on a React app, the link to the blog is given below.
